jobId.description: The unique identifier for the job

timestamp.description: A UNIX timestamp of when the job was submitted

IoUThrd.description: Threshold level for IoU (intersection over union) at which two detection can be matched

maxCandidateAge.description: Number of consecutive matches after which a candidate instance becomes a tracked instance

maxLostAge.description: Number of consecutive non-matches after which instance is considered picked

RoI.description: Region of Interest (described by the corners in pixel units as [x_min,y_min,x_max,y_max])

daqName.description: Name of the data acquisition unit, used for selecting DB

weightFileName.description: Name of the file containing the weights of the network whose detections will be used

dateStart.description: Start date (included) as a string in the format: YYYY_MM_DD_HHMM

dateEnd.description: End date (not included) as a string in the format: YYYY_MM_DD_HHMM
